text:
Would be easier and faster to have in context menu One click reversal option to enabling / disabling (sub)trees in set of chosen (highlighted) branches.

For now I have to enable first what was disabled and then disable what was enabled.
creator: adrian.bala@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Fixed as part of 51821

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 51821 ***
